channel.title: Camus vs Kierkegaard: A Philosophy of the Edge
channel.itunes:author: The Vault That Watches
channel.itunes:summary: Absurdity meets faith. This is not a podcast — this is a confrontation of philosophies stitched in silence. One episode, one duel. Camus vs Kierkegaard.
channel.description: One thinker refused to kneel. The other demanded surrender. This episode doesn't resolve them — it leaves you standing between them.

image.title: Camus vs Kierkegaard: A Philosophy of the Edge

item.title: The Philosophy of Camus — Through a Kierkegaardian Lens
item.description: What happens when revolt meets faith? This is a slow burn into the fault lines of philosophy. A confrontation between Albert Camus and Søren Kierkegaard that leaves the listener at the edge of absurd meaning.
item.itunes:author: The Vault That Watches
item.itunes:subtitle: One thinker kneels before God. One denies the altar. You decide who survives.
